Description.Text:
Set in beautiful landscaped gardens just outside the rural village of Bovingdon, the Bobsleigh Hotel offers quiet serene surroundings whilst still being within easy reach of the M1/M25, the town centre and local industrial estate of Hemel Hempstead. The Bobsleigh Hotel has 46 tastefully decorated bedrooms some with 4 poster beds and jacuzzi baths. Only 2 miles away is the Hemel Hempstead Train Station, from where you can catch a train to get into Central London within 25 minutes to enjoy the numerous museums and shops, the city's vibrant night life and the world-famous West End Shows. The Restaurant offers a wide range of excellent food served by friendly staff. In 2008 the restaurant has been awarded an AA Rosette, which means that the high standards of food and consistency have been recognized. There is an excellent selection of wines to complement your meal. The hotel is also a venue ideal for hosting wedding receptions and hold a wedding license to host civil ceremonies. The Bobsleigh Hotel is the ideal venue for anyone looking to relax either after business or for pleasure.
The hotel has no smoking policy.

Classic - Twin - Classic Twin offers two twin beds. Classic rooms at the Macdonald Bobsleigh Hotel offer comfort and space in no-fuss surroundings. Full en-suite facilities, internet access and comfortable beds add to the attraction of the family-friendly rooms. The tranquillity of the garden setting is a world away from the stresses of city life.
Classic - Double - Classic Double offers one double bed. Classic rooms at the Macdonald Bobsleigh Hotel offer comfort and space in no-fuss surroundings. Full en-suite facilities, internet access and comfortable beds add to the attraction of the family-friendly rooms. The tranquillity of the garden setting is a world away from the stresses of city life.
Executive - Double - Executive Double offers one double bed. Bobsleigh Hotel provide accommodation for business travellers within just minutes of London. Unwind after a busy day at the office in a spacious and airy executive room. Take a relaxing bath or shower and soothe away the tension and the stresses of the city. Internet access and a generous work area make planning for the day ahead even easier.
Executive - Twin - Executive Twin offers two twin beds. Bobsleigh Hotel provide accommodation for business travellers within just minutes of London. Unwind after a busy day at the office in a spacious and airy executive room. Take a relaxing bath or shower and soothe away the tension and the stresses of the city. Internet access and a generous work area make planning for the day ahead even easier.
